mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEM_ID, NAME, PW, EMAIL, ADDRESS, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, PHONE) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{address},#{address1},#{address2}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID=#{ID} AND PW=#{PW}
